Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting details8:45pm walked out to my backyard to smoke a ciggerette stayed outside at 9:00pm airplane or so it looked with no sound right after that two orbs\lights came speeding out of nowhere moving in odd angles then 10mins later there was 5 then 6 then 7 orbs\lights cirleing each other so i called my nephew and my sister in law outside to look and they saw the same thing that lasted for a hour they would fly around for a few minutes then stop over and over the orbs\lights would do that 10:05 came inside stummped then i started looking at vids on youtube then i saw yaws site so i started putting my info in so maybe somebody could come with a camera and video these orbs\lights i only have a camera phone and it doesnt work in the dark they are probly still out there right now but i dnt want to wake up my nephew so im staying in for the night 11:14pm
Summary: lights that move quick somtimes up to 7 at a time moving at crazy speed and angles then hover and stay still then take off again
